website_summaries.verdict: These slides are well liked for their sporty curb appeal, which prominently features Nike Air Max technology for cushioning.
pros: Prominent Nike Swoosh and Air Max logo across slide strap
Textured footbed prevents slides from slipping
Transparent panel reveals the Nike Air heel for a contemporary, unique spin on traditional slides
Comfortable for prolonged periods of standing and walking
cons: Some consumers find them to be wider than other styles they tried, and material feels somewhat lightweight

customer_reviews.title: 100% DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item from Romania. My size is 8.5, I ordered size 9 and they are very small. Cheap chinese plastic smell. Original box and product tags do not look like Nike original products. I feel scammed and to return them it will cost me more than I paid for. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: not the best, but not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: i don't know if this product is "original" or not, but feels very cheap material, im size 9 1/2 US and i ordered 12 US since i know my size it fit perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: esteban lopez

customer_reviews.title: Over advertising
customer_reviews.text: It's not what I expected but I will definitely not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Webb

customer_reviews.title: Prefect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9, I ordered a 9 and it fits me perfectly, they feel very comfortable, I walked a mile in them and they never once slid off my feet and if you wear sandals you know some sandals we’ll do that. these don’t. I don’t like the price! I don’t like dropping $70 on a pair of sandals however these are so comfortable that I’m debating getting the gray and green ones right now 👍
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Size Up An Entire Size! They Run Small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my boyfriend who is a size 10.5 in men's shoes and since these slides don't come in half sizes I went ahead and sized up and ordered him the size 11 men's. Well as you can see from the picture, they're still somewhat too small. I am a size 10.5 in women's shoes and when I tried these slides on they fit me well which is surprising because a 10.5 women's is supposed to be a size 9 in men's shoes. I suggest going up and entire size if you're interested in these slides since they definitely run very small. 5
customer_reviews.author: L&P

customer_reviews.title: Is not all that for chubby foots
customer_reviews.text: Nice but if you got a chubby foot you will have a hard time adjusting because the top is as is and doesnt adjust around the top of your foot. Too pricey. Next time il get the one with velcro asjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged package
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in a damaged package with the tags ripped off. I’m not even sure if they are the right size now. I purchased as a Father’s Day gift so I don’t have time for an exchange. The box was hold in place with rubber bands because the box was destroyed. Because I’m not sure if they would fit given the circumstances I gave 1 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Yaquelin Reyes

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good i like them let's see how long will they last i even ordered a 10 in size and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D

customer_reviews.title: fell apart too fast
customer_reviews.text: these Nike shoes are just what my husband wanted. I buy him these type of slides all the time. this pair wes great at first but within 4 months they started falling apart on the side. the part that holds your foot down. I will continue to buy him Nike slides but maybe not this one again
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking sandals
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this for my husband but they were too narrow for his wide feet. He gave them to me instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parker

customer_reviews.title: Conversation starter and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I always get questions about these sandals because they have Air in them. Super comfy and sporty. Can wear them pretty much anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: BALDWIN SYKES

customer_reviews.title: Great slide
customer_reviews.text: These are great and look like the photo. I will say that the lime is slightly yellow over green in person. The shoe is nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Another Air slide, but these are abrasive on soft feet, compared to a PU footbed.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't a layered construction, it's just EVA for the whole thing, with rubber under the air insert. I think as the footbed gets broken in, it won't cause rawness on my big toes. To break them in without them breaking my feet I have been wearing them about an hour a day.
customer_reviews.author: GDBF137

customer_reviews.text: I got my self the Grey and neon green. Love the color, 10/10. Looks amazing. Only thing is that an 11 sure fits like a 10 so it's a bit short, 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Lillian G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort as expected with Nike Air technology.
customer_reviews.text: I've run using Air-Max shoes for ~20 years and been very satisfied. Now I have these very comfortable slippers for walking around the house with the same amazing soft support in the heels. They cost more, but you can't beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: It’s helps for my bad feet and perfect comfort and fit
customer_reviews.author: Moises banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Authentic !
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are sold out everywhere! Amazon was the only place I was able to find them with quick delivery. The quality is good and they are authentic. My husband loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great overall sandal, just came torn on one side of the sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable they are and stylish. Got a lot of compliments and people bought them after seeing mine. Color looks great. Only issue was that the sandal came a little torn by the section where it expands. Besides that for sure worth it
customer_reviews.author: Hilga Sole

customer_reviews.title: My new work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I work from home, I need a more sturdy and comfortable shoe. I prefer slides rather than slippers because they offer more support. This did the trick. The real test is how well they last since I wear them everyday, all day. My other two non-athletic slides lasted three months. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my Dad's birthday and was happy that it came in a day early (which was on his actual birthday). The slides fit well. He stated that it felt a little loose at first and wasn't as comfy. I have bought slides before and told him that he just needed to walk around in it for a bit to break it in. He wears it all the time now and hasn't complained about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black ones for my husband and received the gray and green ones. They were still comfy and We kept them but was a little upset. Still good quality and fit
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Nike shoes and sandals since the 80's! All been great and comfortable. Awesome styles n colors too. I got my Wife into them too!
customer_reviews.author: SZEPNSHER

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You’d think with the air bubble they would be more comfortable but they are actually much stiffer than normal slides. So I’m not impressed for the cost I’d recommend sticking to the regular ones
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are genuine Nike sandals. They feel cheap and very hard sandals. The air bubble has condensation from being near pool. Not Nike quality that you come to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: The sandals soles are hard like wood and tight on one foot. There is nothing comfortable or supportive about them.
customer_reviews.author: Actual Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort, but I should have ordered a half size larger
customer_reviews.author: Shaka

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my son on his birthday. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: MsGrass

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This is LITERALLY how my package arrived! And the sandals had no tags on them or anything even though though were advertised as “brand new”! How disgusting of this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. George

customer_reviews.title: Nike needs to stick with sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews . Way over priced, i would expect this quality for &19.99 not $75
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Great product wish it was more softer all in all good
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in pictures, cheaply made and very light. Not even sure if it's legit nike. Very expensive dont worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chatoor

customer_reviews.title: Flat footed men: be wary
customer_reviews.text: I love these slides. I recommend buying a half size up you have wide feet. I think they're a little narrow
customer_reviews.author: Nicola A. Cafaro

customer_reviews.title: For the price I paid it wasn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had these for two weeks and they are already ripping at the seams I paid $80
customer_reviews.author: Sara Shores

customer_reviews.title: Okay for Second Place
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and the he feels the ‘air’ effect. In comparison to the Lebron James’ slides, they are 2nd place in terms of fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love my slides
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair kinda like these before, that where adjustable.. paid $40 for them and $70 for these.. but those lasted for years, I hope these do the same
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Nike slides
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as described... Very uncomfortable not like other Nike slides I’ve owned
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them and they are just as pictured. He says they are so comfortable and hasn't taken off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jamelia

customer_reviews.title: Bed product! Better save your money
customer_reviews.text: Ridicules! I got the shoe one size 10 one size 11!!!!! Bad product!! Better save your money and not buying the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Shefer

customer_reviews.title: Great Slides
customer_reviews.text: I ship this to my cousin in Bahamas, OMG Athens whole island is asking him about the slides. The slides was sold out but you had them. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: SavageJuicey

customer_reviews.title: These are for style not comfort
customer_reviews.text: They feel like I'm standing on bricks they are not comfortable even though they have air bubbles not worth the money I also bought a pair of slides from crocs they were half the price and so comfortable I ordered another pair
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: Awful pair of sandals. Small and tight. And the food bad is some hard plastic that makes it very uncomfortable. Returning immediately. The box arrived smashed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Not bad of a product but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable it is and nice to get wet for beaches or water parks but a little to price for these.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy one size larger than I wear in a regular shoe so that my foot isn’t hanging off the end. Great looking and very comfortable. Took about 2 days to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scammed me!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product and it wasn’t Nike! Returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. Said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Skinner

customer_reviews.title: They are price to high and it feels like you’re walking on the ground
customer_reviews.text: They were very uncomfortable they had no bounce to them even though they had the air bubbles in them I have adidas Sandler’s that are half the price and they feel like you’re walking on a cushion
customer_reviews.author: nathan leary

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to get your foot in feels very tight and hurts when walking
customer_reviews.text: Hurts the top of my foot had bought a size 10 returned them and got a size 11 and the comfort is still the same not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: twylanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and stylish but kind of pricey for a slide.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Best lookin sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: Prob the best Sandals I've ever owned..They look good, feel good , and they do the job..If they were regular price I'd buy another..
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Tight squeeze
customer_reviews.text: They are very narrow, and plenty long. No wide options available in size. Hopefully the loosen up as they break in.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Tribby

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Other than the Nike box being beat up and secured by a rubber band, the product is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Too too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute for my boyfriend. I love slipping them on to run outside because they are so comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son and husband they love the look and fit of this slide

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that I couldn’t pick the width of the sandal.Also I bought the same sandal for 40 dollars cheaper after shopping around.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these from this seller its a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Priced way to high I bought them and realized same pair brand new at shoe show for under 40$ returned them and got ones from shoe show fit good comfy slides

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my boyfriend and he loves them..they fit perfect and very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Tight and small
customer_reviews.text: Should not be worn at all. Very bad slides. These might even cause pain all over your feet.

customer_reviews.title: One sandal is bigger than the other
customer_reviews.text: Both sandals are supposed to be size 9. But one is Bigger than the other.
customer_reviews.author: danskidan1

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet. Fattys beware! Lol
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and this will not fit you if you do too.

customer_reviews.title: Its made from hard material.
customer_reviews.text: Its good but its hard material.. if your looking for soft and comfi slide its not for u :)

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buy a size up I had to return the first pair to small in my right size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable I love them will buy again in a different color

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like them. They fitted good they look OK but It feels like plastic they not worth $60
customer_reviews.author: Bazel Naji

customer_reviews.title: It’s an  okay product
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, but unfortunately it doesn’t work for people who have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: ivanjesusgomezmejia

customer_reviews.title: Might even cop a second pair for down the road
customer_reviews.text: Like wearin a cross between a lightweight Air max sneaker and sandal combined... love em 👍👍

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: It came out quickly and it was in the original box. It for perfectly and is very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Exelente
customer_reviews.text: It fits my husband perfectly. He loves it. He is looking forward to purchase one more.

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable for extended use
customer_reviews.text: thought the strap was adjustable like my previous nike slides 😪 it runs against top of foot if no socks in

customer_reviews.title: They run a little small
customer_reviews.text: It ran a little small compared with my other slides but I do really like the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Slide
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and I love it!! The price was too high, but I love the Nike slide.

customer_reviews.title: Looks very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift and the young man is very pleased with how they feel and look.

customer_reviews.text: The slides came in a torn, beat up box and slides seemed slightly damaged

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fits correctly with no velcro strap. No regrets I luv em.

customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't worth the money I paid for it

customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable but I got a size small that’s ok

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Air max slides - The most comfortable slides I’ve worn!

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: They are better than expected! Exceeds my expectations from a sandal.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in July and they are already leaking air in September?
